summary: This is a confidential email from attorney Jennifer Freeman of the Marsh Law Firm PLLC to Audrey Strauss, with a copy to Joyanna Silberg. The email includes an attached letter and contains a standard confidentiality notice regarding attorney-client privilege and the non-formation of an attorney-client relationship unless explicitly stated.

persons.name: Jennifer Freeman
persons.context: Sender of the email, attorney at Marsh Law Firm PLLC, providing a letter to Audrey Strauss.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Primary recipient of the email and attached letter from Jennifer Freeman.

persons.name: Joyanna Silberg
persons.context: Copied on the email from Jennifer Freeman to Audrey Strauss.

connections.description: Jennifer Freeman is sending a letter to Audrey Strauss, indicating professional communication between legal parties.
Jennifer Freeman copied Joyanna Silberg on the email to Audrey Strauss.

keyFacts: The email is dated November 10, 2020, and is from attorney Jennifer Freeman to Audrey Strauss.
It includes an attached letter titled '2020-11-10_--_Ltr to_Audrey_Strauss.pdf'.
The communication is marked as confidential and subject to attorney-client privilege protections.
The Marsh Law Firm PLLC disclaimer notes that the email does not establish an attorney-client relationship unless explicitly stated.
